description:
runtime/pprof: disable testing under race detector
until we decide what to do with issues 5659/5736.
Profiling with race detector is not very useful in general,
and now it makes race builders red.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=04e8a421933f ***

runtime/pprof: disable testing under race detector
until we decide what to do with issues 5659/5736.
Profiling with race detector is not very useful in general,
and now it makes race builders red.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10523043

subject: code review 10523043: runtime/pprof: disable testing under race detector
